resources.string: Simple module to enable cast volume control when disabled by the manufacturer.

Cast Enabler is an app that allow you to bypass manufacturer restrictions on cast volume control. 
The purpose of the app is to only enable cast volume control when this was mistakenly disabled by the manufacturer and by no mean was meant to break any law. 
 
Remember that the module is only compatible with Android 12 and that this is a Beta version, if you have any problem please send me a feedback through the thread by clicking the button below. 
 
If you would like to support my work you can buy one of my other apps, Thank you! 
If you like instead to stop me worrying you with this you can hide the icon ðŸ˜­
